952500.name: NASCAR Heat 3 - October Pack
952500.description:
The NASCAR Heat 3 October DLC includes 43 new paint schemes from the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, many of which are "Throwback" schemes. Also included are 10 schemes from the NASCAR XFINITY Series, 9 from the NASCAR Camping World Truck Series, 3 new Challenges, and MRN announcer Alex Hayden spotter audio!

Expect paint schemes like the following:

MENCS:
Kyle Larson, DC Solar Throwback
Kyle Busch, Skittles Throwback

NXS:
Christopher Bell, Rheem Throwback
Kevin Harvick, Hunt Brothers Pizza Throwback

NCWTS:
Johnny Sauter, ISM Connect (Patriotic)
Grant Enfinger, CURB Records

Plus many more!
952500.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
